document_data.caption: A map showing Pearl Alley in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Pearl Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Pearl Alley''' was a small backalley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Pearl Alley was located in the northeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. It originated on [[Zastrow Street]], branching west then northwest before terminating at a dead end near the [[Three Pearls Nightclub]].
